body: For a long While, i hadn't played on avicus. Well, since my holidays are going on right now.. I can Rejoin Avicus. Anyone remember me? eh forget it . ill be on tomorrow morning. Cya, Night folks over at avicus!

title: Im Back.

replies.body: Hi, welcome back! I remember seeing you around.
replies.body_tagged: Hi, welcome back! I remember seeing you around.

replies.body:
Hey, I don't quite remember you, but welcome back :)
Have a good sleep!

replies.body:
Welcome back!

Some Rules have changed, maybe you want to re-read them.
If you have questions, you can always ask an helpful community member or someone from the staff team.

Anyway welcome back, I hope to see you ingame soon :D
